data.text:
Explore Italy together with us, book a SIXT holiday car with free Additional Drivers!
Rent your car with our exclusive rental car partner SIXT and add up to 9 Additional Drivers for free! 😉

Fly Air Dolomiti ✈️ – Drive SIXT! 🚘

👉 https://t.co/MydHLzhbjY @SixtDE @SixtIT https://t.co/4ZfSv36AuQ

Welcome on board 💙 
Ready to take off? 😄✈️

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/83qlmdm0A9

The city of Linz on the Danube – a mere heartbeat away! 😍 
Fly from Frankfurt to Linz for a relaxed getaway: winding streets, baroque architecture and culinary riches await 👉 https://t.co/1MuEvIemK7 https://t.co/qPa2otX5U8

data.text:
Whether you’re an immersive explorer or a wild wanderer, hungry for history or haute cuisine, a courtier of culture or the creative arts, Europe is OPEN for travel and reencounters this summer 🤗🌍

Learn more 👉 https://t.co/ZkrMGrE5Q2

#OpenUpToEurope #VisitEurope https://t.co/08fbsFSwv4

There's nothing more Danish than cycling, right? 🚲 In #Aarhus, you can discover the city like a local - on two wheels! Discover more about the city here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

📸 Robin Skjoldborg https://t.co/9FFWS4Y4HX
Aeroplane lights can be fixed or flashing, white, green or red. But... What exactly is their function? ✨ Find out on the #AirDolomitiBlog  👉  https://t.co/O5gr4BlZlc https://t.co/E6v1ejlJ5t

data.text:
The longing for sun, a holiday or a change of scenery has probably never been greater ☀️  
Until 15.09.2021, you’ll receive extra status miles on flights with Lufthansa Group airlines and selected airline partners 🛫 🗺️
Discover more with Miles&More 👉 https://t.co/PjQ5FdlN61 https://t.co/wnagH2B7pT

Happy #internationalfriendshipday 👬
Daniele and Tommaso, they share the same passion: aviation ✈️ and they are both football fans too!
They met inside Air Dolomiti's flight deck but their friendship has also grown outside work. Do you have a colleague "buddy"? Tell us more! 😊 https://t.co/gXKD3jrLl5

Happy #internationalfriendshipday 👭👬
Milena and Cristina met in Air Dolomiti in 2013.
They are proof of how a lasting friendship (and many aperitifs 🍹) can emerge and blossom in a work environment.

Tag your aperitif colleague and tell us your story 😊
 #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/9rXEccS0gF

data.text:
Very few people can claim to have seen our planet from space, but we've got some spectacular images taken by drones! The third part of our story on aerial photography on the #AirDolomitiBlog 📸
👉 https://t.co/jOJwHkWSr9 https://t.co/kwTMYuNWqG

Put your explorer mode on and visit the #GrottadiBossea caves, not far from #Cuneo.
You will see underground streams and lakes, stalactites and stalagmites... Be sure to book your ticket! 
👉 https://t.co/j8NPq8SUVZ

In collaboration with @AtlCuneese
Ph.: R. Croci https://t.co/5xnH5xZT0L

Who was Louis Blériot and how did he manage to fly the distance from France to England over a century ago? Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog, we tell you his story.
Learn more 👉 https://t.co/DoLjVZK6Xw https://t.co/AYQCLiwG1b

“Somewhere over the rainbow
Bluebirds fly
And the dreams that you dream of
Dreams really do come true”
🌈🌈🌈
Flying to Frankfurt! Thanks to our crew for this shot 😍

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/oEsVtsfhiC
All Air Dolomiti planes have a HEPA filter on board, considerably improving the air you breathe during your flight, purifying it and making your journey safer.  ✈️ https://t.co/XAQbBBD6O5

Now is the perfect time to visit Aarhus, also known as the City of Smiles and Europe's second happiest city. Ready to go? On the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/Z4A8M27kI8 https://t.co/HGK2JWuXCD

From the thrill of seeing passengers experience their first ever flight to being proud of Air Dolomiti's desire to set itself apart, there's never a dull day in Andrea's job.
💙 https://t.co/sAQxNuEnD3

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/dJovPQ6YSY

Goddag, Denmark! 🇩🇰
Let's set off to discover the city of everyday wonder: from today we fly you to Aarhus! 😍

Special thanks to @AARairport for this warm welcome!

@VisitAarhus #visitDenmark #Aarhus #AdAstra #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld #SettimoCielo https://t.co/GsWzXciszz

How much work goes into aeroplane safety? We'll tell you all about it (with huge admiration for the delicate task of our pilots and technical staff) on the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/8cM3Ycrfr3 https://t.co/ICauX46nhR

It only takes a few simple habits to turn a trip from stressful to relaxing. Once you’ve discovered them on our website, you won’t be able to live without them! https://t.co/hS2yjDNw4L ✈️ https://t.co/BDtckVPdNJ

Did you know that #Denmark's second city #Aarhus is also known as "The City of Smiles"? 😊 Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

📸 Robin Skjoldborg https://t.co/ea3QLHveCJ

data.text:
Here’s our second instalment on the history of aerial photography with its breath-taking images. Don’t miss this radical change of perspective in photography on the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉https://t.co/drjBX4ck49 https://t.co/z9Kv6xBEMl

We'll give you a good reason to start your day on the right foot: celebrate with us the reopening of our route Munich - Cuneo! 🎉

All details under 👉 https://t.co/Dx9GlZcZiO

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/9LzgCdRZdf

“Guude” or “Servus”?
Our aircraft says “hello” to both Frankfurt and Linz for this new Air Dolomiti connection!
Thanks to Linz airport for these nice pics ✨

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/IPL4pURUd8

What items mustn’t you forget on your way out the door? Documents, luggage and self-declaration. A self-declaration is compulsory in order to best protect you and all passengers flying with Air Dolomiti. For more information, see: https://t.co/uXcXf4Ja8R https://t.co/g7oZxx1Yrs

We assure you that you will not be disappointed, because #Verona is a city that deserves a place on your bucket list 🚩

😍 @dusairport & Aeroporto di Verona

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/Y9QuG8oSsk

data.text:
"One door closes and a plane door opens", isn't that how the saying goes? Let's not pretend: the average #AvGeek is better at science than witty banter... Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog, we're looking at aircraft hold doors.
👉 https://t.co/lQFfg3cvKb https://t.co/y93ppjwBC4

Originality, innovation, internationality, colour and a smile: just some of the things Marian has brought to Air Dolomiti over the past 20 years.
💙 https://t.co/MGf2DXgWsV

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/9To2lde0kq

Ever got that feeling of Déjá-vu? 
That's right, from today we have resumed our operations from Munich to Forlì and this is the warm welcome they reserved for us! 😄
Info 👉 https://t.co/Im42EUUWHv

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #ForlìAirport #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/KUUQ5ZBO1m

We're back 😉
If you're looking for your next city to visit, you can now discover Verona from Berlin! 
@berlinairport 💙
#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld

Ph. credits © Günter Wicker / Flughafen Berlin Brandenburg GmbH https://t.co/EypW5Bz0yw

data.text:
#Cuneo might be less known, nonetheless it's a city with its very unique treasures. 
Did you know that the Royal Castle of Racconigi is an UNESCO World Heritage Site?
👉 https://t.co/FiD5kZt7eQ

In collaboration with @AtlCuneese
Ph. Credits: Roberto Croci https://t.co/bNQI2remFF

We are pleased to announce the new operations departing from Berlin and Düsseldorf to Verona, starting from June 19th.

All details under https://t.co/padZnYzaWK https://t.co/BVY04wXyBH

Your eyes do not deceive you! Amalia Ercoli-Finzi is an aerospace engineer, scientist, researcher, pioneer and mother of five children; a true force of nature. You can read her story today on the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/ULHQwum3Rd https://t.co/lTqO8LzRLL

data.text:

Ready to fly ✈️

#MondayMotivation #WeAreAirDolomiti

Ph. Alessandro Pezzin https://t.co/fgw6hyZ5DL

data.text:
‘Air Dolomiti changed my life. One day I helped a grumpy passenger on the way back from a trip to Canada. He had a tight connection and was worried about his luggage. Today, that passenger is my husband and my daughters’ dad.’ Full story
 👉 https://t.co/fSM115VOWV https://t.co/HZ5301lKff

Verona is not only the city of love... Verona is so much more! 💙
🍽️ good food
👙 just enjoying the sun on Lake Garda 
🚲 for active holidaymakers 

Now also directly from #Berlin and #Düsseldorf! ✈️

👉 https://t.co/AfbJjToSkD https://t.co/euOnSSB7qI

Gather round curious minds: this is the article for you! Five bizarre questions about aeroplanes and flights, today on the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/Pi8GiNhkyI https://t.co/vffVC3iy9r

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Did you know that you can have a quick test before flying? The COVID-19 swab test simplifies all entry and exit procedures to and from Italy. Go to the last section to visit all the relevant airport websites: https://t.co/GlDfryrOxm https://t.co/DdNaEKTZJZ

Fresh water for a fresh start! ☀️
With this welcome water arch, the new Milan Linate-Munich route receives its “air baptism” in the Bavarian capital. Embraer, strike a pose! 📷
Two glamorous cities, two countries and almost exactly 1h apart.
✈️ @MUC_Airport 
#AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/j5WisqdWrX

The years go by, as do the passengers who board Air Dolomiti flights every day. In 30 years, we’ve seen more than 27 million travellers pass by. Our goal? To welcome just as many in the coming years. 💙
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/zdL5xRM9ZM

The mindset of being a flight attendant stays with you, but it's not all about following the rules. It's also about each flight being a fresh start and learning never to leave a cupboard door open!  
💙 https://t.co/llGWyCH0qN
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/kbukgEbhz5

Sand castles or capture the flag?
🤸 This promotion is truly a child's play! 
💸 Travel with us and enjoy a 99% discount on the child fare.
💼 Pack your bags with your children and discover your destination between 01 June and 30 September.

Conditions 👉 https://t.co/LSosWXq6Kr https://t.co/SbvAxxp69p

Solid, powerful, agile, light, safe, comfortable... Find out on the #AirDolomitiBlog what materials make our planes exude such... quality!

👉https://t.co/Bzl6JD1nFM https://t.co/chug15JH06

For your next trip, besides your hand luggage, don't forget the Passenger Locator Form in digital format when entering Italy.
Starting May the 24th click, fill in, show: you're ready to relax on board with us!
All information here: https://t.co/WLDoH4ZPNG https://t.co/pyXVlSPlMh

data.text:
Did you know that with the #Lufthansaapp you can search & book flights, add a checked in 🧳 or access information relating to your flight?
The app provides a host of services that you can use conveniently via your smartphone, tablet or Apple Watch.
👉 https://t.co/S3GW7AdVYk https://t.co/TQQcYlafNj

Let's fly into the weekend!
✈️
We all have our personal way of flying: some fly with a little paper airplane, others with a small model, and then there are those who fly wearing an ENergy Team T-shirt! 
How will you be flying this weekend? Tell us! 😉 https://t.co/DaTN8R2rUG

1, 2, 3, cheeeeeeese! Photographs taken from above show a completely different perspective on the world. Who are the pioneers of aerial photography? Find out on the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/K4MHfmiUk1 https://t.co/DXvFGXJtGX

Becoming a captain with Air Dolomiti: a journey worth making!
💙 https://t.co/GNT7qtmSo0
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/kWbRjpHvHr

data.text: Fabric face masks are cool, but safety is in fashion on our flights. Wear a surgical mask correctly for the whole flight to ensure a safe journey for you and other passengers. ✈️ FFP2 masks without valve are allowed too! https://t.co/2TLdPDNQUZ

💙 This is for all the mums! 💙
They are the guides in our life's journey. 
Their love is unique and special.
Destination World is the most beautiful journey our mums could give us!
A huge thank you to our precious colleagues and to their beautiful children.
#WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/emMe3uWJtf

‘In total, we manage more than 20,000 different product codes, but even a humble screw can only come in if it meets air transport standards. It’s a matter of safety’. Attention to detail is something that has always set us apart. 
Full interview 👉 https://t.co/fSM115VOWV https://t.co/u1kwV98lld

Starting from 19 September 2021, new connections will be operating between Frankfurt and the Swedish airports of Ronneby and Kalmar.

For further information 👉 https://t.co/QPq3ErtLv4

Photo credits PSC Berni https://t.co/hBLO2HGylK

We are pleased to announce the new operations departing from Milan Linate to Munich. 
From 7 Jun, 2 daily frequencies will be operated to the Bavarian hub.
All details under https://t.co/SbxztJXpan https://t.co/abhBV5k1IT

The health of our passengers and our on-board crew has always been a priority. Decrees and regulations encourage us to take all the necessary precautions to make each trip as safe as possible. You can find all the information here: https://t.co/CQRtwZVhRo ✈️ https://t.co/vQme6Km1Gv

data.text:
*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On May 1st our social media channels will not be staffed and our Service Center will remain closed.

For assistance please contact our colleagues at Lufthansa: https://t.co/xrBI3IKAnD

See you on May the 2nd 🤗

Who said that a good pilot can't also be a good writer? The #AirDolomitiBlog this week introduces three novels written by aviators to add to your library! 
👉https://t.co/XbM7cfNqZf https://t.co/eUwh13d9Td

Discover the Miles & More promotion!
On all #AirDolomiti flights in 2021, you’ll earn twice the status miles in any booking class. All details here https://t.co/BrkDLUDgdb

Valid until 31.12.2021 https://t.co/rpmDq0lfJP

data.text:
We at #AirDolomiti are proud to share that we have joined the #Compensaid program, created by Lufthansa in collab with the #LufthansaInnovationHub. 
Discover how to make you air travel CO2 neutral with Compensaid https://t.co/B1cfbcy65X https://t.co/bBcom8Uchq

‘In 25 years with Air Dolomiti, I’ve accumulated more than 14,000 flight hours, which is 583 days in the air. I still enjoy every flight as if it were my first.’ Some things never grow old. 
Full interview 👉 https://t.co/fSM115VOWV https://t.co/g6NRAwftJw

20 years at Air Dolomiti and still laughing. Claudia talks about her time working for the company and her hopes for the future. 
Full interview 👉 https://t.co/QRYUkFK51I
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/qWPceJbbIq

How come the command bar has a French name in Italian? And how come the same equipment goes by a different name in French? How baffling... Shed some light on the situation with the #AirDolomitiBlog!
👉https://t.co/LHxq0PwfoK https://t.co/cmFWv9Xl8Y

https://t.co/8eD11RBSzC ✈️ https://t.co/AJhm5JWmOb

data.text: RT @lufthansaNews: Half a century ago today, Lufthansa arrived at @torinoairport for the very first time, connecting Piedmont with the worl…

How did people work in airport control towers before the advent of computers? With paper, pen and an inkstand. Mary Chance VanScyoc, the world's first female air traffic controller, knew a thing or two about it... 👉https://t.co/YjHfoaeysC #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/yPTpR1StJv

The real value of a company are its people, and that's where we want to start – from our people.
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/OM89zHBFrg

data.text: From March 30 onwards all passengers aged 6years or older who wish to enter Germany via flight, from risk and non-risk areas, must present a negative Covid19 test on departure. Guests cannot otherwise be boarded. https://t.co/IyFU4NAIqh https://t.co/laxULvaJ90

Taking off into the weekend 🛫
Pic credits: Bio_Spotter https://t.co/D1vU92zKzD

Once again, the #AirDolomitiBlog pays tribute to a great woman of the past: Amelia Earhart, who achieved her dream of becoming an aviator thanks to the support of her mother. #TB #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/ZZLvru5nGB

data.text:
“The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart”
― Helen Adams Keller

As #AirDolomiti we are the 1st Italian Airline and the 2nd of the #LufthansaGroup to be equipped with an electronic Technical Log Book system which fully replaces the old. We got your attention? Check out more about this fascinating tech system here 👉https://t.co/ZRjVJrdaZz https://t.co/sDKKCozTYO

data.text:
On Jan 1 and 6 our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed. We will be back online on Jan 2 and 3. Our Sales Center will also be there on Jan 4 and 5 from 9 am to 5 pm! 
We wish you all a great #NewYear2021! ✈️ 
#BackInTheSkyTogether
